posts.post_title: FS (3rd price cut) - N300 Mayo's Cut Plug Otis Stocksdale - SGC 3
posts.post_content: For Sale (3rd price cut) - An N300 Mayo's Cut Plug Otis Stocksdale.  $475 venmo no fee or zelle, $490 if you prefer pp gs.  Price includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking. Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover NC ST.
